DataElement.preferredName: Indwelling Central Venous Catheter Associated Venous Thromboembolism Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not venous thromboembolism occurrence is associated with an indwelling central venous catheter.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Indwelling Central Venous Catheter Associated Venous Thromboembolism Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indwelling catheter designed for central venous access._Joined in some kind of relationship._Occlusion of the lumen of a vein by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Indwelling Central Venous Catheter Associated Venous Thromboembolism
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
An indwelling catheter designed for central venous access.
Isa: Indwelling Catheter; Central Venous Access Catheter
:Joined in some kind of relationship.:Occlusion of the lumen of a vein by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream.

Concepts.definition: An indwelling catheter designed for central venous access.
Joined in some kind of relationship.
Occlusion of the lumen of a vein by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
